state: The dinner is almost ready! It's only missing a grilled half of a bag of chips. -= Bedroom =- You've just sauntered into a bedroom. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. You can see a chest drawer. You can see an antique trunk. There's something strange about this being here, but you can't put your finger on it. You see a king-size bed. The king-size bed is usual. The king-size bed appears to be empty. There is a closed wooden door leading east. > -= Bedroom =-0/1
You open the chest drawer, revealing an old key. > -= Bedroom =-0/2
admissible_commands: take old key from chest drawer
optimal_action: take old key from chest drawer

state: -= Kitchen =- You arrive in a kitchen. An usual kind of place. You bend down to tie your shoe. When you stand up, you notice a refrigerator. Hmmm... what else, what else? You smell an intriguing smell, and follow it to a counter. The counter is standard. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You see a stove. The stove is ordinary. But the thing hasn't got anything on it. You can see a kitchen island. The kitchen island is ordinary. On the kitchen island you see a note. There is a closed screen door leading east. There is an open wooden door leading west. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-1/6
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: You open screen door. Your score has just gone up by one point. > -= Kitchen =-2/7
admissible_commands: put old key on kitchen island

state: -= Backyard =- You find yourself in a backyard. A typical one. You begin to take stock of what's in the room. You see a set of chairs. The set of chairs appears to be empty. You move on, clearly depressed by your TextWorld experience. You see a bbq. But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage. Oh wow! Is that what I think it is? It is! It's a patio table. The patio table is normal. But the thing is empty. It would have been so cool if there was stuff on the patio table. There is an open screen door leading west. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Backyard =-2/8
admissible_commands: put old key on patio table
put old key on set of chairs
